waypoint.title: Lions Trailhead
waypoint.caption: Official Lions Trailhead with limited parking at end of Sunset Road

waypoint.title: Brunswick Junction
waypoint.caption: Forest trail continues straight for Mt. Brunswick. Continue on logging road to the right

waypoint.title: Harvey Junction
waypoint.caption: Binkert trail continues straight. Turn left by the cairn and head up

waypoint.title: Howe Sound Viewpoint
waypoint.caption: Clearing and superb viewpoint of Howe Sound. Trail ascends more steeply towards Harvey ridge

waypoint.title: Lions Viewpoint
waypoint.caption: Steep trail tops at clearing and surprise Lions viewpoint. Turn left and follow trail up Harvey ridge

waypoint.title: Mt. Harvey
waypoint.caption: Summit of Mt. Harvey. Return the same way
